title: Prism Backdrops 10X20' Chromakey Green Muslin Photo Video Backdrop Background
description: This is a professional muslin backdrop made from a heavier 100% cotton material. The 10X20' size (actually about 9X18' after shrinkage) weighs 5.7lbs. The 10x20' size units also come with a black carry bag to protect your backdrop from dust and stains between uses. The carry bag includes a color window to identify the color of the backdrop inside. Prism premium cotton muslin backdrops are offered in three standard sizes:10X20' (actually 9X18', 5.7lbs)10X12' (actually 9X10.8', 3.8lbs)6X10' (actually 5.7X9', 1.9lbs)Special dyes are used to obtain well saturated colors which appear vibrant and not washed out. All sides are stitched to avoid unraveling and a 3.4" rod pocket is sewn into the top. Each muslin is folded and comes in a plastic bag to avoid moisture and stainage and then each bag is packed in a cardboard box for shipping.
